        <api_name>global.NowAssistInVAAdminConsoleUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>

        <description/>
        <name>NowAssistInVAAdminConsoleUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var NowAssistInVAAdminConsoleUtil = Class.create();
NowAssistInVAAdminConsoleUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	createAgentChatConfig: function (name) {
		var agentChatConfigGr = new GlideRecord('sp_agent_chat_config');
		agentChatConfigGr.initialize();
		agentChatConfigGr.name = name + ' Chat Config';
		agentChatConfigGr.active = false;
		agentChatConfigGr.order = 0;
		return agentChatConfigGr.insert();
	},

	updateAgentChatConfigActiveFlag: function (agentChatConfigSysId, activeFlag) {
		var agentChatConfigGr = new GlideRecord('sp_agent_chat_config');
		if (agentChatConfigGr.get(agentChatConfigSysId)) {
			agentChatConfigGr.setValue('active', activeFlag);
			agentChatConfigGr.update();
		}
	},

	updateAgentChatConfigPortalsList: function (agentChatConfigSysId, portalsList) {
		var agentChatConfig = new GlideRecord('sp_agent_chat_config');
		if (agentChatConfig.get(agentChatConfigSysId)) {
			agentChatConfig.setValue('portal', portalsList);
			agentChatConfig.update();
		}
	},

    type: 'NowAssistInVAAdminConsoleUtil'
};]]></script>
